document.full_text: new york city began offering a new card on wednesday that lets people buy prescription drugs at big discounts, a step that could potentially increase drug sales and ease strains on the city's public hospitals.
document.title: nyc offers discount card for prescription drugs
lines_and_colors: new york city began offering a new card on wednesday that lets people buy prescription drugs at big discounts, a step that could potentially increase drug sales and ease strains on the city's public hospitals.
